attributes.action: force the British TV industry to produce a new series of Spitting Image
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The much loved and much missed TV series last aired in January and February 1996 and is overdue for a return to our screens. The series will provide much needed comic relief in our high stress culture of political correctness.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
